title: First hijab-wearing UK court judge hopes to be 'trailblazer'
description: Raffia Arshad says she has "broken that stereotype" of what most people imagine judges look like.

title: Claire Foy and Matt Smith to perform live in empty Old Vic theatre
description: The socially-distanced play, featuring The Crown actors, will be streamed live from the Old Vic.

title: Coronavirus: PPE hospital 'wedding' for Basildon physio
description: Colleagues stage a ceremony in masks and visors for a woman who should have been getting wed.

title: Thirsk woman, 99, to stand 100 times for son's hospice
description: As she turns 100, Joyce Richardson, of Thirsk, is raising funds for a hospice that cared for her son.

title: Record drop in energy investment, warns International Energy Agency
description: The pandemic has caused a record fall in energy investment and will likely lead to more pollution.

title: Inspectors find Glasgow's Barlinnie jail 'not fit for purpose'
description: Inspectors say urgent improvements must be made to Glasgow's Barlinnie jail, which is not due to be replaced until 2025

title: Coronavirus: 'I made a ventilator from a coffee machine'
description: Businessman Ross Hunter has reached the finals of a global challenge to create a low-cost ventilator.

title: Twitter tags Trump tweet with fact-checking warning
description: This is the first time the social media giant has said President Trump's tweet could be misleading.

title: Coronavirus: 'Our children are all shut behind closed doors'
description: Lockdown has left many families with disabled children feeling cut-off, isolated and ignored.

title: Coronavirus: How childminders are caring for children in their own home
description: 'Lots of soap' is crucial, say childminders who have stayed open for key workers' children.

title: Four Minnesota cops fired after death of unarmed black man
description: The FBI investigates Minneapolis police after video shows man being arrested saying "I can't breathe".

title: Coronavirus: Why Merkel may help fund Europe's recovery plan
description: Germany’s leader has agreed to shoulder some of the burden, but four "frugal" EU states are unhappy.

title: Mumbai: How Covid-19 has ravaged India's richest city
description: With nearly 30,000 cases, Mumbai accounts for more than a fifth of India's coronavirus infections.

title: Coronavirus: The human cost of virus misinformation
description: A BBC team tracking coronavirus misinformation has found links to assaults, arsons and deaths - and the potential for even greater indirect harm.
